name: admin.users.session.invalidate
desc: Revoke a single session for a user. The user will be forced to login to Slack.

session_id.desc: ID of the session to invalidate.

team_id.desc: ID of the workspace that the session belongs to.

user_id.desc: ID of the user that the session belongs to.

errors.admin_unauthorized: The token provided doesn't have permission to revoke a session.
errors.cannot_invalidate_primary_owner: Only the primary owner of an organization can invalidate a primary owner's sessions.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The token provided can't call this method.
errors.invalid_auth: The provided token doesn't have access to this endpoint.
errors.not_an_admin: This method must be called by an Org Owner or Admin.
errors.session_invalidation_failed: There was an error invalidating the session.
errors.unknown_method: This method is currently not available.
